With a lot of effort and even more saving, Cristian was able to start his business of selling typical food, he works about 10 hours a day, and can attend to up to 40 customers every day. He believes that his business is going well because he has great seasoning for the preparation of his plates and above all, because he is charismatic. 

Cristian is very thankful for the Kiva loans because thanks to the support they have provided, he will be able to purchase rice, sugar by the sack, as well as coal in bulk to be able to make his dishes. This way he will be able to improve his income, and will be able to take better care of his customers and continue to fight to achieve his dream of having a large restaurant.

loans.use: to purchase rice, sugar, and sacks of coal

loans.name: Aydee Gladys

texts.es:
Aydee tiene 47 años de edad, vive en la ciudad de Nazca, ciudad que se caracteriza por tener un clima cálido, asimismo lugares turísticos muy visitados en todo el año como son las “Líneas de Nazca”, el “Cementerio de Cahuachi”, entre otros. Aydee es una mujer muy alegre y trabajadora y cuando tiene un tiempito libre le gusta mucho cocinar ya que tiene una buena sazón y le encanta disfrutar uno de sus platillos favoritos el cual es el riquísimo “pollo a la Braza”. Aydee es madre de 5 hijos, los cuales ya son mayores pero por quienes ha luchando junto a su esposo para sacarlos adelante y sobre todo sean personas de bien.

Con mucho esfuerzo y sobre todo ganas de salir adelante día a día Aydee estudio la carrera de educación inicial y gracias a ello trabaja en su  negocio de guardería, ella labora 8 horas al día y atiende a 10 niños cada día en su guardería; ella cree que le va bien, porque los padres están contentos con su trabajo y sobre todo porque ama su trabajo y tiene mucha paciencia con los niños.

Aydee está muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado ella podrá iniciar su negocio de venta de ropa para niños y niñas, con lo cual podrá originar un ingreso extra y poder mejorar su calidad de vida, así ella seguirá trabajando y luchando por hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Tener una guardería más grande y cuidar más niños”.
texts.en:
Aydee, 47, lives in the city of Nazca, a place known for its warm climate, as well as tourist sites that are visited year round, like the Nazca Lines and the Cahauchi Cemetery, among others.  Aydee is a very joyful and hardworking woman. When she has some free time, she likes to cook because she has a very good seasoning and she loves enjoying one of her favorite dishes: the delicious Pollo a la Brasa, a Peruvian chicken dish. Aydee has five children, who are all grown now. Together with her husband, she fought to move them forward and for them to be good people.

Day after day, with a lot of work and the will to move forward, Aydee studied a degree in early education. Thanks to this, she works in her childcare business. She works eight hours a day and attends to ten children every day in her daycare. She believes that it is going well for her, because the parents are happy with her work and most of all because she loves her job and has a lot of patience with the children.

Aydee is very grateful to the Kiva lenders, because thanks to the help they have given her she will be able to start a business selling clothing for boys and girls, with which she will be able to generate extra income and improve her quality of life. She will keep working and fighting to make her biggest dream a reality: "to have a bigger childcare center and to care for more children".

loans.use: to buy children's clothing.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy wood.

loans.name: Lady Karol

texts.es:
Lady vive en la ciudad de Nazca, ciudad que se caracteriza por tener un clima cálido, asimismo lugares turísticos muy visitados en todo el año como son las “Líneas de Nazca”, el “Cementerio de Cahuachi”, entre otros. Lady es una joven muy trabajadora y con muchos deseos de salir adelante, pero cuando tiene un tiempito libre le gusta mucho comer uno de sus platillos favoritos el cual es el riquísimo “Chicharrón de Pollo”. Gracias al esfuerzo de sus padres logro estudiar la carrera de Técnica en contabilidad, pero debido a que no pudo conseguir empleo tomo la decisión de formar su negocio.

Día a día Lady trabaja en su pequeño negocio de venta de productos de Belleza, ella trabaja alrededor de 8 horas al día y puede atender hasta 5 clientes diariamente; ella cree que le va bien en su negocio porque es muy amable con los clientes y porque ofrece productos de calidad a un buen precio.

Lady está muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado ella podrá comprar mercadería para abrir una tienda de bazar en su domicilio como  adornos, regalos, ropa, entre otros ya que se encuentra ubicado en una calle muy transitada de la ciudad, así de esta manera ella podrá mejorar su ingresos y seguir trabajando y luchando para poder hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Tener un gran negocio”.
texts.en:
Lady lives in the city of Nazca, which is characterized by its warm climate and is also home to very popular year-round tourist attractions, such as the Nazca Lines and the Graveyard of Cahuachi, among others.  Lady is a hard-working young woman who is eager to get ahead, but when she has a little time off, she likes to eat one of her favorite dishes, rich and delicious Chicharrón de Pollo (fried chicken skin, a traditional snack). Thanks to the supportive efforts of her parents, she was able to take technical coursework in accounting, but because she could not get a job she decided to start her own business.

Lady does day to day work in her small business selling beauty products, and she works about 8 hours a day and can serve up to 5 customers daily.  She believes that she is doing well in her business because she is very friendly to customers and because offers quality products at a good price.

Lady is very grateful to the Kiva lenders, and thanks to the help they have given, she can buy merchandise to open a variety store at home with different decorations, gifts, clothing, etc.  It is located on a busy street city​​, and thus it may improve her income, and she will keep working and struggling to realize her greatest dream: "Having a great business."

loans.use: to buy merchandise like adornments, gifts, clothing, and more.

loans.name: Nelly Yuly

texts.es:
Nelly tiene 29 años de edad, ella vive en la ciudad de Pucallpa, ciudad que se caracteriza por tener un clima muy cálido y acogedor, asimismo hay una variedad de platillos típicos muy deliciosos, paisajes muy bellos y fauna muy hermosa. Cuando Nelly tiene un tiempito libre le gusta mucho salir a pasear con su pequeño hijo de 4 años de edad, por quien lucha cada día para poder darle una vida digna y sobre todo porque lo ama y quiere lo mejor para el.  Debido a sus pocos recursos económicos Nelly solo pudo estudiar hasta el quinto grado de secundaria, pero le hubiera gustado estudiar Contabilidad. 

Día a día Nelly trabaja en un restaurante de su ciudad, ella labora alrededor de 9 horas al día y también tiene un pequeño negocio de venta de frutas en su vivienda; ella cree que le va bien porque es responsable y sobre todo porque tiene muchas ganas de salir adelante.

Nelly está muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado ella podrá comprar materiales como madera, clavos, listones, entre otros para realizar la construcción de un cerco en su vivienda, de esta manera podrá tener mayor seguridad para su familia y podrá seguir luchando cada día para poder hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” poder darle una buena educación a su hijo y tener un negocio de venta de abarrotes”.
texts.en:
Nelly is 29 years old. She lives in the city of Pucallpa, a city which is known for its hot climate and for being friendly and welcoming. There are many delicious dishes typically served here, beautiful landscapes and pretty fauna. When Nelly has some free time she likes to spend time with her 4-year-old son. Every day, she fights to be able to provide him a dignified life, above all because she loves him and wants a better life for him. Because her few economic resources, Nelly was only able to study until the fifth grade of secondary school, but she would have liked to study accounting.

Day to day Nelly works in a restaurant in the city. She works around 9 hours per day and also has a small fruit-selling business in he house; she believes that it is going well for her because she is responsible and above all because she desires to get ahead in life.

Nelly is very thankful for the Kiva loans, since, thanks to the support that they have brought her, she will be able to purchase materials such as wood, nails, beams, and other things in order to construct a fence around her house. This way, her family will be able to have more security and she will be able to continue fighting every day for her biggest dreams: giving her son a good education and having her own grocery business.

loans.use: To purchase construction materials such as wood, nails, and beams, among others.

loans.name: Desiderio Rolando

texts.es: El Sr. Desiderio, de condición humilde, se dedica a la actividad Agrícola y también presta sus servicios como Construcción Civil, tiene un hijo, convive con su mujer casi dos años, el cliente por si solo supo salir adelante, su madre hace poco falleció y le dejo a el solo ya que él vivía en la misma con su madre. Se dedica a la producción de papa en la misma comunidad por ello solicita un crédito para la compra de semilla de papa ya que esta en la época de siembra por lo que quiere aprovechar, pues de esa manera podrá vender mas, lo cual hará que sus ingresos mejoren a lo largo del año. Cuenta con una vivienda propia ubicada en la Comunidad de San Andrés, lugar donde desarrolla su actividad sin ningún problema, además quiere mejorar su condición de vida para que pueda formar una familia y ofrecerles un estatus de vida mejor.
texts.en: Desiderio, of humble background, works in agriculture as well as in construction. He has one child and lives with his wife of almost two years. He figured out how to get ahead on his own. His mother died recently and left him alone as he lived with his mother. He works in potato production in the same community. He is requesting a loan to buy potato seeds as it is planting season and he wants to take advantage of it. This way he could sell more which will improve his income throughout the year. He has his own house located in the community of San Andrés, a place where he operates without any problems. As well, he wants to improve his living conditions so that he can have a family and offer them a better status in life.

loans.use: to purchase agricultural supplies.

loans.name: Wilber Antonio

texts.es: Don Wilber, un pequeño comerciante de frutas y verduras de un mercado de Managua, su esposa trabaja en una farmacia de esa manera ellos se apoyan para sacar adelante a sus dos hijos que estudian y necesitan de mucho cuidado porque están pequeños, al señor Wilber le urge construir otro cuarto, debido a que todos duermen en una misma habitación y es muy incomodo para ellos ya que sus cosas como ropas y zapatos de uso personales las pone agrupadas una encima de otra por la falta de espacio. Por tal motivo acude a solicitar apoyo crediticio para comprar materiales de construcción como cemento, arena, piedrines, bloques, hierro, alambre de amarre y el pago de la mano de obra para empezar a construir el cuarto, así brindarle mayor comodidad a su familia.
texts.en:
Wilber is a small businessman who sells fruits and vegetables in a Managua market and his wife works in a pharmacy. In this way they support each other in helping their two children get ahead. Their young children are in school and still require a lot of care. 

Wilber wants to build another room on his house, since now they all sleep in the same bedroom and it is very uncomfortable because there is not enough room for everyone’s clothes, shoes and other personal belongings. Consequently he is requesting a loan in order to buy construction materials, such as cement, sand, gravel, blocks, iron and wire ties and pay for labor, so he can start adding the room.  This will make his family more comfortable.

loans.use: to buy construction materials, such as cement, sand, gravel, blocks, iron and wire ties and pay for labo

loans.name: Mnuka Group

texts.en:
Rehema is in her mid-20s and is single. She had a broiler business which she closed after three-fourths of her chickens died, and currently she has been running a pharmacy business for six months. She works daily from 8 AM to 9 PM and is able to make a good monthly profit.

She is requesting her second loan from Tujijenge Tanzania. She used the previous loan to buy chickens (broilers) which died and to cover household expenses, and she has paid back her loan successfully. She hopes for a loan to restock the new pharmacy business items. Her dream is to one day be able to own a wholesale pharmacy.

She will share this loan with her 12-member loan group, Mnuka, who will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to restock the new pharmacy business

loans.name: Up To Date Group

texts.en:
Zakaria is in his early 30s and is married.  He has been running a photography business for eight years now. He works from 8:30 am to 6:00 pm daily, and is able to make a good monthly profit.

This loan will be his 4th loan from Tujijenge Tanzania. He used his previous loans to buy a big camera, buy a flash for his camera, and pay household expenses. He has paid back all his loans successfully. His dream is to one day open a big studio. 

He now wants a loan to start selling gas cookers. Zakaria will share this loan with his loan group, Up to Date, which as a total of 11 members who will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to start selling gas cookers.

loans.name: Juana

texts.es: Doña Juana tiene 36 años de edad vive en San Juan de la concepción municipio cercano a la ciudad de Managua, ella se dedica al negocio de fabrica de camioncitos de juguetes elaborado con madera, su esposo le ayuda con el negocio haciendo los camioncitos, tienen 4 hijos todos estudiante de la escuela primaria, la mayor dificultad que se le presenta es que a veces la madera se pone muy escasa y ella no puede avanzar con su trabajo. Juana esta solicitando apoyo crediticio por primera vez para comprar materia prima como lo son madera, clavos, hule, pegamento y pintura, para hacer mas camioncitos y aumentar más sus ventas para poder darle a sus hijos los estudios y en un futuro mejorar su casa.
texts.en:
Juana is 36 years old. She lives in the municipality of San Juan de la Concepción, near Managua. Juana makes a living selling toy trucks that she makes out of wood. Her husband helps her with the business making the trucks. They have 4 small children that attend elementary school.

Juana's biggest obstacle is that sometimes wood becomes scarce and she cannot advance in her work. Juana is requesting her first loan in order to buy materials like wood, nails, drop cloths, glue, and paint so that she can make more toy trucks and increase her sales. This way, she will be able to send her children to school and in the future, improve her house.

loans.use: to purchase raw materials: wood, nails, drop cloths, glue, and paint.

loans.name: Karla Patricia

texts.es: Doña Karla de 40 años de edad, siempre trabaja como docente de primaria al igual que su esposo dedicado al comercio. Sus dos hijos todavía van a clases por los que ellos trabajan arduamente para apoyarlos a avanzar con sus estudios, su principal sueño a futuros y dificultades que ha tenido Karla es el terminar de construir su casa, esta vez el séptimo crédito solicitado es para hacer su cocina para poder comprar más materiales de construcción como arena, cemento, bloques, hierro, perlines, zinc alambre, clavos y el pago de la mano de obra para lograr terminar de construir su vivienda y brindar mayor comodidad a su familia.
texts.en:
Karla, who is 40 years old, has always worked as a primary school teacher, just as her husband has made a living in sales. Her two children still go to school, which is why they both work hard to support them in advancing their studies. 

Her main dream and difficulty is to finish building her house. This time, the seventh loan requested is to build the kitchen, namely to buy more construction materials such as sand, cement, blocks, iron, purlins, zinc wire, and nails as well as to pay for labour. This will allow the completion of the construction of her home and will provide her family with more comfort.

loans.use: to buy sand, cement, blocks, iron, purlins, zinc wire,and  nails as well as to pay for labour.

loans.name: Daniel Javier

texts.es:
Daniel es un joven muy luchador y emprendedor, vive en el distrito de Parcona, Ica, Perú; el cual se caracteriza por uno sus atractivos turísticos el cual es el “Bosque de Piedras”, cuando Daniel dispone de un tiempo libre le gusta descansar y sobre todo comer uno de sus platos favoritos el “Ceviche”; el solo estudio hasta el cuarto grado de educación secundaria, pero le hubiera gustado estudiar Ingeniería Mecánica.

Con mucho esfuerzo el desempeña su trabajo como chofer de taxi, durante 10 horas al día y puede transportar hasta 40 clientes, en algunas oportunidades Daniel trabaja como operario en una mina con lo cual tiene un dinero extra para cualquier ocasión, el cree que le va bien en su negocio porque es muy respetuoso con sus clientes y honrado.

Daniel está muy agradecido con los prestatarios kiva es la segunda vez que le brindan su gran apoyo  ya que gracias a su ayuda podrá comprar llantas nuevas, base para parrilla (para llevar bultos), mejorar la caja de cambios, con ello seguirá trabajando y podrá seguir luchando para cumplir su gran sueño:” Tener su flota de autos”.
texts.en:
Daniel is a very enterprising young man and a fighter.  He lives in the Parcona district of Ica, Peru, known for one of its tourist attractions, the Bosque e Piedras [Stone Forest].  When Daniel has some free time he likes to rest and especially eat one of his favorite dishes, ceviche.  He only studied up to the fourth year of secondary school but he would like to have studied mechanical engineering.

With great effort he works as a taxi driver for 10 hours a day, transporting up to 40 customers.  Sometimes he works in a mine, which gives him extra money for any occasion.  He believes it's going well for him in his business because he's very respectful and honorable with his customers.

Daniel is very grateful to the Kiva lenders because thanks to their help he'll be able to buy new tires and a grille carrier (for luggage), and improve the transmission.

It's the second time they have given him a lot of support.  With this he'll continue working and be able to continue striving to realize his big dream: "To have his fleet of cars."

loans.use: to buy tires and a luggage carrier, and to change the transmission

loans.name: San José  (Cuenca) Group

texts.es:
El banco comunal San José está conformado por 9 socias y 1 socio quienes se reúnen una vez al mes en la casa de una de sus compañeras en la comunidad de Ingapirca en Cuenca, este sector es de clima frió, cuenta con una geografía accidentada lo que le da a este lugar hermosos paisajes, su gente se dedica en especial a la cría de animales, a la agricultura y muchos salen de sus comunidades diariamente a la ciudad a trabajar en diversas actividades, trabajos que le permiten solventar los gastos de su hogar y mejorar la economía de sus hogares, su gente como las socias de este banco comunal son personas ambles, gentiles y de un corazón cálido que aun mantienen la cultura y tradiciones de sus pueblos.

Una de las socias de este grupo es la  Señora. Ana y tiene 43 años de edad, está separada de su esposo pero fruto de su unión conyugal ha concebido 6 hijos de 22, 20, 18, 15, 12, 8 años de edad, sus tres primeros hijos trabaja, le ayudan económicamente y están estudiando en un colegio a distancia, sus dos hijos siguientes están estudiando en un colegio y su ultima hija estudia en una escuelita de la localidad. La casa en la que vive es de su propiedad.

Doña Ana se dedica a la crianza de ganado, borregos y cerdos a los que los vende en su comunidad, como tiene terrenos también se dedica a la agricultura, siembra verduras  que son para el consumo de su hogar y si existe sobrante lo vende. Trabaja también 4 días a la semana como empleada domestica pero solo medio tiempo.
 
Su crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de cerdos y alimento para sus animales. 

Su meta es incrementar la producción ganadera.

La foto pequeña es de una socia que pudo estar prresente cuando se tomo la foto del grupo.
texts.en:
San José communal bank has ten members, nine women and one man. They meet once a month at one of the partners’ houses in the town of Ingapirca, Cuenca. The region has a cold climate and a rugged geography, which provides for a beautiful landscape. Many of region's people work in animal husbandry and agriculture. Others leave their communities every day to go and work in the city, doing all types of jobs to help them pay the household bills and increase their household income. The region's people, just like the members of the communal bank, are friendly, kind and warm-hearted, and they still follow the culture and customs of their towns.    

Ana is one of the members of the communal bank, and she is 43 years old. She is separated from her husband but her marriage produced 6 children, a 22-year-old, a 20-year-old, an 18-year-old, a 15-year-old, a 12-year-old, and an 8-year-old. Her first three children work, help Ana financially and study at a distance-learning college. Two of her children are still finishing high-school, and her youngest child studies at a small school in the community. She owns the house where she lives.

Ana rears cattle, sheep and pigs which she then sells to the local community. On her land she also grows vegetables for household consumption, and sells the extra produce. She also works 4 days a week as a housekeeper, although she only works half-days. Ana is going to use her loan to buy more pigs and animal feed, and her aim is to increase livestock production. 

The small photo in the corner of the main photo depicts one of the members who could not be there on the day the group photo was taken.

loans.use: to buy pigs and animal feed

loans.name: María Reina De La Paz  (Cuenca) Group

texts.es:
El banco comunal María Reina de la Paz esta formado por 11 socias y 1 socio, que viven en diferentes lugares de la ciudad de Cuenca, ciudad que se encuentra rodeada por montañas, es desde Diciembre de 1999 Patrimonio Cultural de la Humanidad, esta bañada por 4 ríos, su centro es una mezcla de la arquitectura colonial y la moderna. Su gente al igual que todas las socias de este banco comunal son personas amables, gentiles y de un corazón cálido, trabajan diariamente en diferentes actividades las mismas que les permiten solventar los gastos de sus hogares y salir adelante.

Una de las socias de este grupo es la Señora. Mónica, tiene 37 años de edad, es casada y fruto de su unión conyugal ha concebido 4 hijos de 19, 16, 13 y 9 años de edad, su primera hija trabaja y ayuda económicamente, sus dos hijos siguientes estudian en colegio y su último hijo estudia en una escuelita de la localidad. Su esposo labora en una empresa como empleado privado, no tienen casa propia por lo que vive en casa de sus suegros pero de manera independiente.

Doña Mónica es propietaria de una tienda hace 8 años, labora de domingo a domingo sin un horario fijo, también se dedica a la preparación de buffets y en el arreglo de salones para todo evento social.
  
Su crédito va a invertir en la compra de víveres para incrementar su tienda.

Su meta es agrandar su tienda para tener más variedad para su clientela.
texts.en:
The María Reina de la Paz communal bank group is made up of 11 female members and one male member. They all live in different parts of the city of Cuenca. The city, surrounded by mountains and four rivers, has been a UNESCO World Heritage site since December 1999. Its center has a mix of colonial and modern architecture. The people of Cuenca, like each of the members of this communal bank group, are kind, gentle, and warm-hearted. They work daily in different jobs that help them to pay their household expenses and get ahead.

One of the members of this group is Mónica. She is 37 years old and married. She and her husband have four children together; the children's ages are 19, 16, 13, and 9. Her oldest daughter works and helps her financially. Her next two oldest children are high school students, while her youngest studies in a small local school. Mónica's husband works for a company in the private sector. They do not have their own house, so they live in Mónica's in-laws' house but independently.

Mónica has been the owner of a shop for 8 years. She works from Sunday to Sunday without a fixed schedule. She also makes a living preparing food for buffets and arranging rooms for all kinds of social events.
  
Mónica's loan will help her purchase food items to expand her store. Her goal is to expand the store and offer a bigger variety of items to her customers.

loans.use: To purchase food items

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase cement, dry sand, and paint, among other things.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy bras, stockings, and other merchandise

loans.name: Brillit Carolina

texts.es: La joven Brillit tiene 5 años de dedicarse a la venta de ropa, es soltera tiene una niña de 5 años, quien ha tenido muchas dificultades al separarse de su esposo, ahora ella es independiente dedicada al trabajo para pagar los estudios de su hija en quien espera termine su educacion superior y sea alguien de bien, que ayude a la población y a su familia. Brillit está solicitando su primer crédito KIVA a travez de AFODENIC para comprar pantalones de damas, caballeros, blusas, sandalias y cosméticos para aumentar su inventario y ofrecerle variedad a su fiel clientela.
texts.en:
Young Brillit has been selling clothes for 5 years. She is single and has a 5 year-old daughter, for whom it has been difficult to be separated from her husband. Now she is independent and she works in order to pay for her daughter's studies, and she expects her to get a higher education degree and become a person with good values, that helps the community and her family. 

Brillit is applying for her first Kiva loan though AFODENIC so she can buy women's and men's trousers, blouses, sandals and cosmetics to increase her inventory and offer variety to her loyal customers.

loans.use: to buy women's and men's trousers, blouses, sandals and cosmetics.

loans.name: Sokhoeurn

texts.en:
Sokheourn is 33 years old. She is married and resides with four children in Takeo Province, Cambodia. She has been selling Akor cake (sweet cake made of flavor) for more than seven years, earning approximately $10 per day. Her husband is a blacksmith, who earns about $4 daily. Her daughter is employed in a garment factory. She earns about $3 each day. 

Sokhoeurn is requesting a loan of $1200 to purchase construction materials to build a new house. This money will help her provide better living conditions for her family. In the future, she would like to expand her business and help her children to earn higher education.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials to build a new house

loans.name: Nit

texts.en: Nit is 33 years old. He is married and resides with his mother and three children in Takeo Province, Cambodia. He has been making brooms to sell for more than five years, earning approximately $4 per day. His wife is employed in a garment factory and earns about $3 daily. In order to improve his family’s finances, Nit is requesting a loan of $600 to purchase brooms from villagers to resell. By doing so, he would earn more income to support the family. In the future, he would like to expand his business and help his children earn bachelors degrees.

loans.use: to purchase brooms from villagers to resell

loans.name: Sa Aem

texts.en:
Sa Aem is 43 years old. She is widowed and resides with four children in Takeo Province, Cambodia. She has been selling Khmer noodle for more than ten years, earning approximately $4 daily. Two of her children are employed. They earn about $7 each day. 

In order to improve her family’s finances, Sa Aem is requesting a loan of $1200 to purchase all kinds of drinks to sell. This purchase will help her generate additional income for the family. In the future, she would like to expand her business and help her children earn higher education. Moreover, she hopes to build a new house as soon as possible.

loans.use: to purchase all kinds of drinks to sell

loans.name: Mlimani Group

texts.en:
Edda is 38 years old and married with three children (two boys and a girl). Two of the children are in school and the third is still an infant. Since 2010, Edda has been running a retail shop.  She is working hard.  She works from 8am to 12pm daily and she is able to make a small monthly profit. 

Edda is requesting a second loan from Tujijenge Tanzania.  She used the previous loan to purchase more shop inventory (soda, juice, boxes of different kinds of pens, wheat flour, etc.) and to cover household expenses. She has paid back her loan successfully.  She plans to use the second loan to restock the missing items in her retail shop so she will be able to sell to more people.  Her dream is to one day be able to own a big wholesale shop.

She will share this loan with her loan group "Mlimani" which has a total of 12 members.  The members of the group will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to restock her retail shop.

loans.name: Miriam Del Carmen

texts.es: Miriam ahora de 30 años de edad, madre soltera de tres hijos siendo el mayor de 9 años por los que trabaja incansablemente para darles lo necesario para su desarrollo y  educación para que sean grandes profesionales en un futuro, todo gracias a su oficio de venta de ropa y cosméticos por lo que solicita crédito nuevamente para comprar productos de los que más se vende los cuales son vanidades, cremas, perfumes, pantalones, camisas, ropa interior; todos vendibles con esta inversión aumentar su inventario, para seguir manteniendo a sus pequeños.
texts.en:
Miriam is a 30-year-old single mother of three children, the oldest of which is nine years old.  She works tirelessly for her children in order to give them what they need to grow and for their education, so that they become great professionals one day.  This is possible thanks to her business selling clothing and cosmetics.  

She is requesting a new loan to buy the products that sell best, which are makeup compacts, creams, perfumes, pants, shirts, and underwear.  Everything she buys with this investment will grow her inventory, so that she can continue to care for her children.

loans.use: to buy makeup compacts, creams, perfumes, pants, shirts, and underwear.

loans.name: Jose Elias

texts.es:
José Elías tiene 49 años de edad, tiene 3 hijos  cuyas edades comprenden entre 29, 27, 20 años y los tres solo han cursado hasta el quinto año de secundaria ya que Jose no ha tenido muchos ingresos económicos y nos les ha podido dar los estudios que ellos hubieran querido, asimismo Jose solo ha estudiado hasta el quinto año de secundaria pero le hubiera gustado mucho estudiar “Mecánica Automotriz”, el plato favorito de Jose son lo “Tallarines con Papa a la Huancaína”, es un platillo a base de fideos cocidos a los cuales se les añade una salsa a base de tomate y se acompaña con papa sancochada las cuales llevan una salsa a base de queso fresco, aji amarillo, pan.

Jose se dedica en la actualidad a su negocio de mototaxi, en la cual realiza transporte de pasajeros por las calles de su ciudad, Jose se le dedica a su trabajo mucho esfuerzo, labora alrededor de 12 horas diarias y atiende alrededor de 80 clientes, puede ganar en un día hasta S/. 68 pero en un día muy bueno puede ganar hasta S/. 100, Jose nos dice que para él cada día es muy bueno porque puede regresar a su casa con dinero para los gastos del hogar, lo cual le brinda un poco de tranquilidad al terminar el día. El cree que le va bien en su negocio porque tiene mucha Fe en Dios y que Dios es el que guía sus pasos por eso siempre tiene algo que llevar a su hogar  y porque es honesto, honrado y respeta a sus clientes.

Actualmente está muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva ya que es la segunda vez que le brindan su apoyo y gracias ello podrá mejorar su vehículo de trabajo que es la mototaxti comprando llantas nuevas y cambio de asientos para la mototaxi, con esta mejora podrá brindarle más comodidad a sus clientes así obtendrá más ingresos y podrá ahorrar para poder cumplir su sueño: “Comprarse un auto”.
texts.en:
Jose Elias, 49, has 3 children who are 20, 27 and 29 years old.  His children only got a high school education, because Jose did not have very much income and so was not able to give them the education that they had wanted.  Jose also has only a high school education, but he would have liked to have studied automotive mechanics.  Jose's favorite dish is  “Tallarines con Papa a la Huancaína."  This is a dish made with noodles and a tomato-based sauce, accompanied with boiled potatoes in a sauce made with cheese, yellow pepper and bread.

Jose has a mototaxi business; he transports passengers through the streets of his city.  Jose devotes a lot of effort to his work.  He works about 12 hours a day, tending to about 80 customers.  In a day he earns about 68 Peruvian soles, but on his best days he can earn as much as 100 soles.  Jose tells us that for him every day is a good day, because he can return to his home with money for the household expenses, and this provides him with a bit of tranquility at the end of the day.  He believes that his business is going well because he has a lot of faith in God, and that God guides him on his steps so that he always has something to bring back to his home.  Also, he is honest and respectful with his customers.

Right now, he is very grateful to the Kiva lenders, because this is the second time that he is being provided with support.  Thanks to this support he will be able to improve his work vehicle, which is a moto-taxi, by purchasing new tires and new seats.  This way, he will be able to provide more comfort to his passengers and thereby obtain more income so that he can save up to accomplish his dream: to buy an automobile.

loans.use: to buy new tires and seats for his moto-taxi

loans.name: Jacqueline

texts.es: La joven Jaqueline de 31 años es casada tiene dos hijos, su negocio es la venta de productos por catálogos comercializados en Managua, Jaqueline está solicitando crédito para poder comprar productos como perfumes, cremas, shampoo, vanidades, pinturas labiales y de uñas así como también ropa, todos de  mayor demanda por sus clientes, para así generar más apoyo económico a su familia e hijos por quienes trabaja para brindarles todo lo necesario para su desarrollo y educación que es lo primordial en la vida.
texts.en:
The young Jaqueline is 31 years old and is married with two children.  Her business is the sale of products by catalog in Managua.  

Jaqueline is requesting a loan to be able to buy products such as perfumes, creams, shampoo, cosmetic compacts, lipsticks and nail polishes as well as clothes, all of which are in high demand by her customers.  This is to generate more income for her family and for her children, for whom she works to provide everything they need for their development and education which is essential in life.

loans.use: To buy perfumes, creams, shampoo, cosmetic compacts, lipsticks and nail polishes as well as clothes.

loans.name: Marie Rose's Group

texts.fr:
Ce Banc Villageois créé depuis le 13 décembre 2008 regroupe des femmes qui sont dans une même association, celles des femmes catholiques qui vivent une parfaite entente et solidarité. Elles ont accepté aussi de s’ouvrir à d'autres dans le soucis d'élargir le groupe.
L’emprunteur en vedette, Marie Rose est âgée de 33 ans. Elle est mariée et a en charge ses enfants . Debout sur la photo et levant la main elle fait comme activité le commerce. 
le prêt reçu lui permettra d'acheter: 40 litres d'huile de palm, 40 litres de jus de citron, 03 porcins qu'elle va élever.
Avec les bénéfices de ses activités ;elle satisfait les besoins de ses enfants plus particulièrement ceux scolaires(les cotisations à l'école, les fournitures). Elle assure aussi la dépense quotidienne.
texts.en:
This village credit group was created on the 13th of December 2008 and is made up of women who are members of the same association, that of Catholic women who live in perfect harmony and solidarity. They have also agreed to widen their membership hoping to enlarge the group.
The showcase borrower, Marie Rose, is 33 years old. She is married and has dependent children. She is standing up in the photo with her hand raised, she is in the retail business.
The loan would enable her to buy: 40 litres of palm oil, 40 litres of lemon juice, and three pigs that she will rear.
With the profits from her activities; she covers the expenses for her children's needs, and more particularly for those that go to school (the school fees and school materials). She also assumes the daily expenditures.

loans.use: To buy palm oil,lemon juice, and pigs.

loans.name: Janny Maribel

texts.es: La joven Janny, su esposo es albañil con quien se apoya para ofrecerle a sus dos hijos  educación que es lo primordial para ellos y alimentación, ella es de familia agricultora de piña, ahora se está incursionando cada vez más en este negocio y para hacerlo de la mejor manera está solicitando crédito para darle mantenimiento a su cultivo de piña comprando abono, urea, insecticida y fertilizantes, los obstáculos que ha tenido en este rubro es cuando los precios están muy debajo de lo normal, esto debido a la  competencia y las ganancias son muy pocas, en un futuro piensa en sembrar más manzanas de piña y otros frutos para incrementar su cultivo.
texts.en: This is Janny. Her husband is a builder, and together they work to feed their children and give them an education, which is of the utmost importance to them. Janny is from a family of pineapple farmers. Now, she is getting more involved in the business and in order to do so, she is asking for a loan to buy compost, urea, insecticide and fertilizer for the upkeep of her crops. She has faced many problems when prices are far below average due to competition, and earnings are low. She is thinking of growing more pineapple trees and other fruits in the future to increase her crops.

loans.use: To buy compost, urea, insecticide and fertilizers

loans.name: Nikel Group

texts.en:
Athanas, who is in his mid-30s, is married with a boy who goes to school.   Since 2010, he has dry cleaned clothes using his washing machine.  He is doing well and his business is doing well in the market.  He works from 8 am to 7 pm daily and he is able to make a good monthly profit. 

He has requested a 4th loan from Tujijenge Tanzania to pay for office rent.  He used the previous loans to buy an iron box, a washing machine and a sofa set as well as to pay school fees, household expenses and office rent.  He has paid back all his loans successfully.  His dream is to one day be able to expand his business in different areas, open a retail shop and build a nice family house. 

He will share this loan with his loan group, Nikel, which totals 15 members.  The members of the group will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to pay for office rent

loans.name: Esequiel Efrain

texts.es: El joven Ezequiel de 32 años de edad, se gana la vida vendiendo con una carreta de manera ambulante bajo el sol y la lluvia en un mercado de Managua hace 12 años, con este negocio ha comprado su humilde casa y le ha venido haciendo mejoras con el pasar del tiempo, ha podido sacar adelante a su esposa quien también vende verduras en el mismo lugar. Ezequiel está optando por primera vez a solicitar apoyo crediticio para tener más variedad de bebidas para su negocio comprando productos como gaseosas, jugos golosinas, te helados, bebidas energéticas y agua purificada, Sus clientes les gusta mucho de los productos que él les vende, sus planes a futuro es tener su propio tramo para poner una comideria.
texts.en:
Esequiel, a 32-year-old young man, has made a living for the past 12 years as a street vendor. He works with his cart come rain or shine in a market in Managua. With his business he bought his humble home, and was able to make improvements to it over time. He was also able to provide for his wife, who works in the same place selling groceries. 

Esequiel has requested the support of a loan for the first time in order to be able to have a greater variety of drinks for his business. He wishes to purchase products such as soda, juice, candy, iced tea, energy drinks and purified water. His clients like the products that he sells to them, and his plans for the future include starting his own eatery.

loans.use: To buy soda, juice, candy, iced tea, energy drinks and purified water.

loans.name: David Josue

texts.es: El joven David de 24 años estudia la carrera de licenciatura en contaduría pública, empezó a trabajar a los 18 años ahora se desempeña en ventas en una fábrica de embotelladora 40 horas semanales, por este medio el paga sus estudios universitarios, pero su salario es muy bajo para pagar su curso de titulación, es por eso que acude a solicitar apoyo de crédito para poder cubrir este gasto, de no ser posible tendría que esperar a tener un mejor trabajo para poder costearlo, le interesa mucho su profesion por que tendrá mejores oportunidades y así podrá ayudar a su familia y brindar un servicio a la comunidad, lo que el comparte con otras personas es que existen organizaciones como AFODENIC y KIVA que apoya para la educación de los jóvenes siempre y cuando exista la responsabilidad y honestidad.
texts.en:
David is 24 years old and is studying an undergraduate degree in public accounting. He started working when he was 18 years old, and now works in sales at a bottling plant 40 hours a week so he can pay his way through university. However, he doesn't earn enough to pay for his university fees, and he has therefore come to ask for a loan to cover these costs. 

Without the loan David would have to wait until he found a better job to afford his education. He is very interested in his profession because he will have better opportunities and it will enable him to help his family and provide a service to the community. He shares with others the belief that organizations such as AFODENIC and Kiva, that help support education for young people, can only exist with responsibility and honesty.

loans.use: to pay for his degree

loans.name: Giussep Edreik

texts.es:
Giussep tiene 19 años de edad, vive en la ciudad de chincha, ciudad que se caracteriza por tener un clima muy cálido y acogedor, asimismo es la cuna de grandes glorias del deporte peruano y sobre todo sus pobladores tienen un don para la preparación de platillos, ya que los preparan de manera deliciosa. Giussep es un joven muy trabajador, pero cuando dispone de un tiempo libre le gusta mucho jugar futbol con sus amigos y vecinos de su barrio y también le encanta comer uno de sus platillos favoritos el cual es la riquísima “Carapulcra”.

Día a día Giussep trabaja como empleado en un supermercado de su ciudad, el trabaja alrededor de 8 horas al día ya por las noches el se encuentra estudiando la carrera de Mecánica y con el fruto de su trabajo puede solventar los gastos; el cree que le va bien, porque  tiene muchas ganas de salir adelante y sobre todo porque ser el orgullo de sus padres.

Giussep está muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la gran ayuda que le han brindado el podrá apoyar a sus padres en la construcción de una cocina y un cuarto ya que actualmente la cocina de sus padres es de adobe y con la construcción del cuarto lo apoyara ya que debido al terremoto del 2007 su casa que muy agrietada y con esta ayuda poco a poco podrá ayudar a sus padres a tener una mejor calidad de vida y poder seguir luchando para poder hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Terminar su carrera y ser un gran mecánico”.
texts.en:
Guissep, 19, lives in the city of Chincha.  This is a city known for its warm and welcoming climate.  It is also the birthplace of many of Peru's sports stars.  But most of all, it is known for being a place where the residents have a lot of cooking talent, because they prepare very delicious dishes.  Guissep is a very hardworking youth, but when he has free time, he enjoys playing soccer with his friends and neighbors.  His favorite dish is the rich "Carapulcra" (a dish made of pork and dried potatoes).

Each day, Guissep works as an employee in a supermarket in his city.  He works about 8 hours a day, and in the evenings he studies for a degree in mechanics.  With his earnings, he is able to cover the household expenses.  He believes that things are going well for him because he has a strong desire to get ahead, and most of all, because he wants to make his parents proud.

Guissep is very grateful to the Kiva lenders, because thanks to the great help they have provided, he will be able to support his parents in the construction of a kitchen and room addition.  Currently, his parent's kitchen is made of adobe.  With the construction of a room, he will support his parents, because due to the 2007 earthquake their house got quite damaged.  With this help, he can gradually assist his parents in having a better quality of life, and he can continue to strive to make his greatest dream a reality: to finish his degree and become a great mechanic.

loans.use: to build a kitchen and a room

loans.name: Jenny Alexandra

texts.es:
La Señora. Jenny se encuentra hace 2 años en el banco comunal 10 de Agosto, vive por los alrededores de la parroquia Santa Ana, lugar que está rodeado por hermosos paisajes, desde el centro de esta parroquia se puede observar gran parte de la ciudad de Cuenca, su gente se dedica a la agricultura, al comercio y a la cría de animales, los jóvenes en especial trabajan en la ciudad ejerciendo diferentes actividades económicas, su gente en especial la mayor mantienen su vestimenta y todos conservan su cultura y tradiciones.
 
La Señora. Jenny es una mujer muy joven tiene 23 años de edad, vive en unión libre y ha concebido un hijo de 7 años de edad, su esposo es de profesión electricista y labora prestando sus servicios, con el trabajo conyugal han logrado construir su casa propia en donde viven en un ambiente familiar.

Ella trabaja hace algún tiempo como empleada privada y trabaja de lunes a viernes  desde las 8 de la mañana hasta las 6 de la tarde, también en su casa cría cuyes y gallinas, estas actividades le permiten aportar a la economía de su casa.

Su nuevo crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de cuyes y gallinas de mejor raza.
 
Su meta es culminar sus estudios secundarios.
texts.en:
Jenny has been a member of the 10 de Agosto Communal Bank for 2 years. She lives in the outskirts of the Santa Ana district, an area surrounded by beautiful scenery. From the center of this district, one can see a large part of the city of Cuenca. The people of Santa Ana make a living through agriculture, trade, and raising livestock. Some, especially young people, work in the city in various economic activities. The people, in particular the elderly, continue to wear traditional clothing and to conserve their culture and traditions.

Jenny is a very young woman. She is 23 years old and lives in a common-law marriage. She has a 7-year-old child, and her husband is an electrician who makes a living offering his services. Through their communal efforts, they have been able to build their own house, where they live in a family atmosphere.

Jenny has been privately employed for some time. She works from Monday to Friday from 8 a.m. to 6 p.m. She also raises guinea pigs and chickens in her house. These activities allow her to contribute financially to her household. She will use this loan to buy better breeds of guinea pigs and chickens, and her goal is to finish her secondary studies.

loans.use: To buy guinea pigs and chickens.

loans.name: Maria

texts.es:
Maria tiene 42 años de edad, vive en la ciudad de Pucallpa, ciudad que se encuentra en la selva peruana, es una ciudad muy calidad y sobre todo con paisajes hermosos que enamoran a muchos turistas en todo el año. Maria es madre de 3 hijos y junto a su esposo trabajan y se esfuerzan mucho para poder darles una vida mejor y sobre todo sean personas de bien. Maria cuando tiene un tiempo libre le gusta mucho comer uno de sus platillos favoritos el cual es el riquísimo “Tacu-Tacu con huevo frito, Maria nos comenta que le hubiera encantado poder estudiar gastronomía ya que por sus recursos económicos solo estudio hasta el quinto de secundaria.

Día a día Maria trabaja en su pequeño negocio de venta de anticuchos, ella trabaja alrededor de 8 horas al día y se levanta muy temprano para poder preparar sus platillos; ella cree que le va bien en su negocio porque tiene muy buena sazón y sobre todo porque atiende de manera amable a sus clientes.

Maria esta muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a ala ayuda que le han brindado podrá comprar 2 carritos anticucheros, ya que sus clientes ha aumentado y con un solo carrito se demora para poder preparar sus platillos; de esta manera el podrá mejorar la atención a sus clientes y de esta manera poder mejorar sus ingresos, así ella podrá seguir luchando por hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Darle una buena educación a sus hijos, tener un local propio y construir su casa de material noble”.
texts.en:
Maria is 42 years old. She lives in the city of Pucallpa, a city in the Peruvian jungle. It is an admirable city and above all the beautiful scenery is loved by  year-round tourists.

Maria is the mother of three children, and she and her husband struggle together to give them a better life, and above all, to be good people. When Maria has free time she likes to eat one of her favorite dishes, which is the tasty “Tacu-Tacu con huevo frito” [leftover rice mixed with a bean purée and then fried, with a fried egg served on top]. Maria says that she would have liked to study gastronomy but because of financial reasons was only able to study through the fifth year of secondary school.

Maria works every day in her small business of selling kebabs. She works around eight hours a day. She gets up very early in order to be able to prepare her dishes. She believes that her business is going well because of the tasty food and above all because she attends to her clients with a friendly attitude.

Maria is very grateful for the Kiva loans because thanks to the help they provide her she can buy two kebab carts, as her customer base has grown and having only one cart slows her down while preparing her dishes. This will allow her to serve her clients better and thus she can improve her income, so she can continue fighting to reach her greatest dream: to give her children a good education, to have her own premises and to build a house with good materials.

loans.use: to buy kebab carts which will help her to serve clients faster thereby expanding both business and income

loans.name: Ana Ricarda

texts.es:
La Señora. Ana es una socia activa hace 3 años del banco comunal 10 de Agosto, vive por los alrededores de la parroquia Santa Ana, lugar que está rodeado por hermosos paisajes, desde el centro de esta parroquia se puede observar gran parte de la ciudad de Cuenca, su gente se dedica a la agricultura, al comercio y a la cría de animales, los jóvenes en especial trabajan en la ciudad ejerciendo diferentes actividades económicas, su gente en especial la mayor mantienen su vestimenta y todos conservan su cultura y tradiciones.

La Señora. Ana tiene 53 años, es casada y en su unión conyugal ha concebido 5 hijos, 2 son casados y viven independientes, una hija es soltera, trabaja y estudia en la universidad, sus dos últimos hijos tienen 14 y 13 años y estudian en un colegio de la localidad. Su esposo labora como guardia de seguridad, la casa en la que habita es de su propiedad. 
 
La Señora. Ana trabaja en un taller de tapicería actividad que aprendió por habilidad, también se dedica a  la cría cuyes y patos.

Ella esta repitiendo el crédito, el anterior lo invirtió en el pago de una letra de un terreno que se compro, en el pago de dicho crédito no tuvo ningún problema y cancelo todas las cuotas en las fechas indicadas. Su nuevo crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de pollos para crecer en esta actividad.
 
La banca comunal le gusta por el compañerismo y solidaridad que existe en el grupo.
texts.en:
Ana has been an active member of the communal bank 10 de Agosto (August 10th) for the past 3 years. She lives close to the Santa Ana parish, in an area surrounded by beautiful landscapes. A large part of the city of Cuenca can be observed from the center of the parish. The local people work in agriculture, trade and raising livestock. Young people in particular work in the city, carrying out different economic activities. The people, especially the elderly, maintain their culture, traditions and clothing. 

Ana is 53 years old, is married and has five children with her spouse.  Two of her children are married and live independently. One of her daughters is single, works and studies at the university. Her two youngest children are 14 and 13 years old and study at the local school. Her husband works as a security guard, and she owns her own house. Ana works in an upholstery workshop, a business that she learned through experience. She also raises guinea pigs and ducks. 

This will be Ana's second loan. She invested her first loan in buying some land, and she had no problems paying it off, with all her installments repaid on the specified dates. She will invest her new loan in the purchase of chickens, so that she can progress in this activity. She likes the communal bank because of the sense of camaraderie and solidarity that exists between the group members.

loans.use: to buy chickens.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to perform maintenance on his vehicle and buy tires.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a refrigerator and to make improvements to the façade of her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay the initial fees for a house.

loans.name: Rosa Adilia

texts.es: La joven Rosa Adilia de 26 años, estudia la carrera de licenciatura en administración de empresas, trabaja como asistente en una empresa privada con su salario devengado cubre sus gastos universitarios pero ahora solicita crédito para poder pagar su curso de titulación y especialidad en dirección de marketing, ya que sus honorarios son muy bajos para cubrir dicho gasto, agradece a AFODENIC y KIVA por brindar este tipo de apoyo a los jóvenes, el futuro de mañana.
texts.en: Rosa Adilia is a 26-year-old woman, and is studying for a degree in business administration. She works as an assistant in a private company. With the salary she earns, she is able to cover her university fees, but she is applying for a loan to pay for a specialized qualification course in marketing management, as her income is too low to cover this expense. She thanks AFODENIC and Kiva for offering this type of support to young people, who are our future.

loans.use: To pay for a qualification course.

loans.name: Ligia Ramona

texts.es:
En la ciudad de Portoviejo, capital de Manabí conocida desde hace muchos años  como la ciudad de los reales tamarindos, se reúnen cada quince días  las socias del Banco Comunal Av. Del Ejército.

La señora Ligia Tiene 59 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tiene 4 hijos los cuales ya son mayores de edad e independientes. Su esposo es comerciante.

Ella para ganar algo por su cuenta y sentirse útil se dedica al comercio, ella es consultora de Yanbal (artículos de belleza, cosméticos perfumería y accesorios para damas), también vende calzado de las marcas Azalea y Dicaza, trabaja todos los días desde las 13h30 hasta las 19h00. Su trabajo consiste en surtir a 12 vendedoras que están a su cargo a quienes tiene que tomarles los pedidos y entregarles los productos. Lo que es la línea de zapatos los compra en Quito, ella lleva más de 14 años dedicada al comercio el cual le ha dejado muy buenos beneficios.

Este crédito lo va emplear en comprar más mercadería como: zapatos de ambas marcas y productos Yanbal para sus ventas personales. Es socia fundadora del Banco comunal y le gusta por la ayuda que siempre le brindan los créditos.
 
Su sueño es ser directora de Yanbal.
texts.en:
In the city of Portoviejo, the capital of Manabí Province, known for many years as the "City of the Royal Tamarind Trees," the partners of the Avenida del Ejército Communal Bank meet every fifteen days. Ligia is 59 years old and married with four children, all of whom are already grown and independent. Her husband is a businessman. In order to earn her own money and feel useful, Ligia works in retail. She is a consultant for Yanbul (a company which sells beauty items, cosmetics, perfume, and women's accessories). She also sells Azalea and Dicaza-brand shoes. She works from 13:30 to 19:00 every day, taking orders and delivering products to the 12 salespeople who are under her supervision. 

Ligia buys her range of shoes in Quito. She has been working in this business for more than 14 years, which has brought her very good profits. She will use this loan to buy more merchandise, such as shoes from both brands and Yanbal products for her personal sales. She is the founding partner of the communal bank, and enjoys the help which the loans always give her. Her dream is to be a Yanbal director.

loans.use: To buy shoes and Yanbal products.

loans.name: Rosa Isabel

texts.es:
En la ciudad de Portoviejo, capital de Manabí conocida desde hace muchos años  como la ciudad de los reales tamarindos, se reúnen cada quince días  las socias del Banco Comunal Av. Del Ejército.

La señora Rosa, tiene 54 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen cuatro hijos todos mayores de edad,  uno de ellos aun vive con ella. Su esposo se dedica a la albañilería, ella nació en Loja pero desde muy pequeña se vino a esta ciudad donde ha hecho su vida.

Doña Rosa para salir adelante junto a su familia y al ver que el trabajo de su marido no es seguro se dedica al comercio, tiene una tienda en su casa donde vende todo tipo de productos, como arroz, azúcar, aceites, detergentes, legumbres, verduras, frutas, además allí mismo también vende ropa de todos tipo,   trabaja todos los días desde las 6h00 hasta las 20h00 y a veces hasta más tarde, su hijo y su esposo le ayudan en su trabajo, cuando ellos pueden y están desocupados. Tiene más de 10 años que se dedica a esta actividad y le va muy bien.

Este crédito lo va a emplear en surtir mas su tienda, va a comprar ropa de todo tipo, arroz, azúcar, aceite, detergentes, embutidos y otros productos de primera necesidad. Está en el Banco Comunal hace 4 ciclos y le gusta porque ha hecho más amigas en el grupo.
 
Sus metas son seguir adelante en su negocio y que su tienda crezca cada día más.
texts.en:
In the city of Portoviejo, the capital of Manabí known for many years as the City of the Royal Tamarind Trees, the members of the Av. Del Ejército communal bank meet every fifteen days.

Rosa is 54 years old, married, and from this marriage has four children, all of whom are adults. One of them still lives with her. Her husband is a builder. She was born in Loja, but she was very little when she came to the city where she has made her life. 

In order to get ahead with her family, and seeing that her husband’s job isn’t secure, Rosa works in retail. She has a store in her house where she sells all types of products like rice, sugar, oil, detergents, legumes, vegetables, and fruits. Besides that she also sells all kinds of clothes. She works every day from 6:00 to 20:00, and sometimes until later. Her son and her husband help her at work when they are free and when they can. She has been running this  business for ten years, and it’s going very well. 

This loan is going to be used to stock Rosa's store, and she is going to buy all types of clothes, rice, sugar, cooking oils, detergents, sausages and other basic necessities. She’s been with the communal bank for 4 cycles, and she likes it because she has made more friends in the group. Her goals are to keep going forward with her business, and to see her store grow more each day.

loans.use: To purchase rice, sugar cooking oil, detergents, sausages, and other basic necessities.

loans.name: Flora Isabel

texts.es:
En la ciudad de Portoviejo, capital de Manabí conocida desde hace muchos años  como la ciudad de los reales tamarindos, se reúnen cada quince días  las socias del Banco Comunal Av. Del Ejército.

La señora Flora tiene 68 años de edad, hace varios años su querido esposo falleció, pero de esta relación  tuvo ocho hijos todos mayores de edad,  dos de ellos aun viven con ella y cuatro nietas menores de edad que estudian en colegio y que son como sus hijas ya que ella les da de todo.
 
Doña Flora desde que falleció su esposo se tuvo que hacer cargo del negocio que el tenia el mismo que consistía en transportar material pétreo y de construcción en una volqueta que es de su propiedad, en la actualidad uno de sus hijos es el encargado de conducir este medio de transporte con el cual se ganan la vida, ellos trabajan con el estado y en forma independiente,  esta actividad la tuvo su esposo por más de 20 años y  siempre les ha ido bien.

Este crédito lo va a emplear para comprar arena, piedra, otros materiales que tiene que trasportar y repuestos para la volqueta. Está en el Banco Comunal hace 5 años  y le gusta porque los créditos son muy útiles para ellos. 

Su sueño es comprar otra volqueta ya que la que tienen esta en poco deteriorada.
texts.en:
Members of the “Av. del Ejército” Communal Bank have been meeting every 15 days for the past two years in the city of Portoviejo, known as the city of the Royal Tamarinds, and the capital of Manabí.. 

Sra. Flora is 68 years old and her dear husband passed away a couple of years ago. She and her husband had eight children, all now adults, and two of whom still live with her along with four young granddaughters, who are in school and who are like daughters to her because she gives them everything.

Since her husband died, Doña Flora has managed his business transporting rocks and construction material in a dump truck he owned. Currently one of her sons is in charge of driving the truck and they make their living from it. They work with the state as independent contractors. Her husband had the business for over 20 years and he always did well with it.

Sra. Flora will use the loan to purchase sand, stones and other materials that she has to transport and to make repairs on the dump truck. She has been a member of her communal bank for five years and she enjoys it because the loans are very useful for the members.

Her dream is to buy another dump truck because the one they have is a bit damaged.

loans.use: to purchase sand, rocks and other materials and to make repairs on her dump truck.

loans.name: Rosa Margarita

texts.es:
En la ciudad de Portoviejo, capital de Manabí conocida desde hace muchos años  como la ciudad de los reales tamarindos, se reúnen cada quince días  las socias del Banco Comunal Av. Del Ejército.

La señora Rosa, tiene 35 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen tres hijos de 11, 9 y 8 años de edad los mismos que estudian en escuela. Su esposo es chofer.

Ella es una ama de casa que para obtener sus propios recursos y con esto poder ayudar a su esposo con los gastos del hogar se dedica a la venta de ropa por catalogo,  zapatos y zapatillas. Trabaja todos los días, sale tres días a recorrer por la localidad y en su casa vende cuando sus clientes necesitan algo, deja sus productos a crédito y cobra cada ocho días,  una vez por mes viaja hasta Guayaquil lugar donde compra a mejor precio. Tiene más de 10 años que se dedica a esta actividad y le va muy bien.

Este crédito es para comprar ropa de todo tipo y zapatos en varios modelos. Lleva tres años en el Banco Comunal y le gusta porque con los créditos ella puede financiar su negocio.
 
Su sueño es tener una boutique.
texts.en:
The partners of The Communal Bank of Avenida Del Ejército meet every fifteen days in the city of Portoviejo, the capital of Manabí, which has been known for many years as the city of the royal tamarind trees.

Rosa is 35 years old, married, and has three children who are 11, 9, and 8 years old and study at school. He husband is a driver. She is a housewife who works selling clothing, shoes, and slippers by catalog, and with this she is able to obtain her own resources and help her husband with the household expenses. She works every day, going through the town for three days and then selling in her house when her customers need something. She sells her goods on credit and collects the amounts owed every eight days. Once a month she travels to Guayaquil where she can purchase products at a better price. She has spent more than ten years with this business, and it is going well for her.

This loan is for buying all types of clothes and shoes in various models. Rosa has three years of experience with the communal bank, and likes it because she can use the loan to finance her business. Her dream is to have a boutique.

loans.use: to buy clothing and shoes.

loans.name: Juana

texts.es: Doña Juana una excelente clienta, este es su noveno ciclo consecutivos trabajando con créditos, con su pequeña tienda de calzado y una farmacia que ahora lo administran sus hijos quienes ya son grandes han sobresalido ante cualquier obstáculo ella y su familia,  ahora está solicitando su noveno crédito para mejorar la infraestructura de su vivienda para construir un muro en la parte del fondo de su vivienda, con el préstamo comprara materiales como cemento, bloques, arena, hierro y la mano de obra para fortalecer mas su hogar y su familia este más cómoda.
texts.en: Juana is an excellent client, and this is her ninth consecutive loan cycle. She has a small shoe store and a pharmacy that her children manage now that they are grown. Together, she and her family have overcome every obstacle that has come their way. Now, Juana is requesting her ninth loan in order to improve the infrastructure of her house. With this loan, she will purchase materials such as cement, cinderblocks, sand and iron, as well as paying labor expenses, in order to reinforce her house so that her family will be more comfortable.

loans.use: To buy cement, cinderblocks, sand and iron, and to pay labor expenses.

loans.name: Juan Jose

texts.es: Don juan José vive ticuantepe municipio muy cercano a la capital de Managua, a sus 74 años de edad siempre se dedica al cultivo de la tierra, trabajo heredado por su familia  quienes también fueron agricultores,  trabaja junto a su esposa quien viaja hasta Managua a vender las frutas, todos sus hijos mayores de edad casados e independientes, don Juan ahora solicita crédito para brindarle mejoramiento a su cultivo de piña comprando fertilizantes, insecticidas, funjicidas, urea y abono para obtener buenos cultivos para mantener las ventas y si es posible aumentarlas.
texts.en:
Don Juan José lives in Ticuantepe, a municipality very close to the capital city of Managua. At 74 years old, he has always made a living cultivating the land, a line of work inherited from his family, who were also farmers. He works together with his wife, who travels to Managua to sell the fruits. All his children are married and independent adults.

Don Juan is now requesting a loan to improve his pineapple plantation. By purchasing fertilizers, insecticides, fungicides, urea and compost, he will obtain a better crop, he will maintain his sales and if possible, increase them.

loans.use: to buy products such as fertilizers, insecticides, fungicides, urea and compost.

loans.name: Oscar Agusto

texts.es: Don Oscar tiene 43 años , de familia agricultora, es casado, tiene un hijo por el que trabaja para darle todo su apoyo tanto económico como emocional para que crezca en un ambiente sano y tranquilo, su esposa trabaja como domestica, su principal dificultad es la variación de los precios en las frutas de piña, debido a la mala cosecha, por lo que está solicitando apoyo de crédito para darle mejoramiento a sus tierras comprando abono, urea, e insecticidas, aprovechando la gran trayectoria y experiencia que tiene en la agricultura, en un futuro desea comprar una propiedad y sembrar otros rubros, para lograr vender mas productos.
texts.en:
Oscar is 43 years old and comes from a farming family. He is married with one son. He works in order to give his son all of his support, both financial and emotional, so that he can grow up in a healthy and calm atmosphere.  His wife works as a domestic assistant. 

Oscar's main difficulty is the variation in pineapple prices, due to a bad harvest. Therefore, he is applying for a loan to improve his land by buying fertilizer, urea, and insecticides, taking advantage of his long career and vast experience in agriculture. In the future, he wishes to buy property and plant more fields in order to sell more products.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer, urea, and insecticides.

loans.name: Henry Augusto

texts.es: Don Henry siempre en su labor como contador de una compañía farmacéutica, trabajo con el que ha sacado adelante a sus pequeños hijos quienes van a la escuela preparándolos para que sean unos profesionales y se valgan por ellos mismos a como lo está haciendo el ahora, tiene el apoyo de su esposa quien le ayuda a cubrir con los gastos básicos de la familia. Henry está solicitando su cuarto crédito para infraestructura de su vivienda para comprar perlines, laminas de zinc y el pago de la mano de obra, esta vez realizara entechado en una parte del patio de su casa, ya que cuando llueve el agua se introduce a la casa y es muy incomodo para los niños por que se puede ver afectada su salud.
texts.en:
Don Henry works as an accountant for a pharmaceutical company to help his young children who are going to school. He wants to prepare them to become professionals so they will be able to support themselves as he is doing now. He has the support of his wife who helps him meet basic family expenses.

Henry is requesting his fourth loan in order to repair the infrastructure of his dwelling. He will use it to purchase beams and zinc sheets and pay for labor. This time he will be roofing one part of the patio of his house, because when it rains the water comes into the house and it is very uncomfortable for his children and could affect their health.

loans.use: to purchase beams and zinc sheets and pay for labor.

loans.name: Agostiny Jesus

texts.es:
Agostiny tiene 34 años de edad, vive en la ciudad de Nazca, ciudad que se caracteriza por tener un clima muy cálido, asimismo se desarrolla la agricultura, en especial el cultivo de tuna, algodón, frejoles, entre otros. Cuando Agostiny tiene un tiempo libre le gusta mucho pasear y jugar futbol, asimismo le encanta comer uno de sus platillos favoritos el cual es la riquísima Pachamanca. Con mucho esfuerzo logro estudiar a carrera de Turismo y sobre todo porque sus padres le brindaron su apoyo a pesar de sus pocos recursos económicos.

Día a día Agostiny trabaja como guía turístico, el labora alrededor de 10 horas al día y puede atender hasta 3 clientes diariamente ya que los paseos a los lugares turísticos toman mucho tiempo; él cree que le va bien en su trabajo porque es amable con los clientes y sobre todo es muy carismático.

Agostiny está muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podrá comprar tablas de sanboarding, para poder brindar este servicio a los turistas y de esta manera tener un ingreso extra, lo que le permitirá seguir luchando para poder hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Tener una gran agencia de turismo y poder apoyar a sus padres”.
texts.en:
Agostiny is 34 years old and lives in the city of Nazca, a city that is characterized by a very warm weather. Also, agriculture is developed there, especially the cultivation of prickly pear, cotton and beans, among others.

When Agostiny has free time, he loves to walk and to play soccer. Also, he loves to eat one of his favorite dishes which is the delicious Pachamanca. With effort, he studied the career of Tourism, especially because his parents supported him despite their limited economic resources.

Every day, Agostiny works as a tour guide. He works about ten hours a day and can serve up to three customers a day since the tours to tourist sites take a long time. He thinks he is doing well in his job because he is kind to customers and also very charismatic.

Agostiny is very grateful to Kiva lenders because thanks to the help given, he will buy sand boarding boards in order to provide this service to tourists and thus have an extra income. This will allow him to keep fighting to realize his biggest dream: "To have a large travel agency and to support his parents".

loans.use: to buy sand boarding boards.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy cement, sand, cinder blocks, iron, wire, and zinc sheets.

loans.name: Moises Melquisedec

texts.es: Moisés, siendo un joven emprendedor de 27 años posee su propia microempresa de reparación, alquiler y mantenimiento de equipos de fotocopiadoras desde hace un año. El joven solicita su primer crédito para comprar dos equipos más de fotocopiadoras y materia prima como toner, para arrendamiento y seguir ganando mas clientela para su microempresa que le ha venido generando ingresos, para ayudar a su esposa e hijo quien todavía esta pequeño, pero se está preparando desde ya para cuando empiece a estudiar no le falte nada y pueda terminar una carrera profesional, su mayor deseo es ver su negocio crecer y ayudar al resto de su familia.
texts.en:
Moisés, being a young, 27 year old entrepreneur, has his own small business.  He has been repairing, renting, and performing maintenance on photocopy equipment for one year.

This young man is requesting his first loan to buy two more photocopier machines and raw material like toner.  He wants this for leasing and to continue winning over more clientele for his small business.  The business has been generating income to help his wife and son, who is still little.  

However, he is starting to prepare now for when his son starts school so that he will lack for nothing and be able to complete a professional career.  His biggest wish is to see his business grow and to help the rest of his family.

loans.use: to buy photocopy equipment and raw material like toner.

loans.name: Alba Marina

texts.es: La joven Alba junto a su pareja se dedica a la comercialización de hortalizas y granos básicos en los principales mercados de la ciudad de Managua, este es el sustento de cada día para su alimentación, los gastos básicos del hogar y la educación de sus dos hijos quienes aun están pequeños y van a la escuela primaria, su mayor ilusión es verlos con una carrera profesional a cada uno de ellos. Alba solicita su primer crédito con AFODENIC para construir un muro perimetral en la parte trasera de su casa, para eso necesitara comprar bloques, cementos, arena, hierro, alambre y realizara el pago de la mano de obra, todo con un solo objetivo ofrecerle mejores condiciones de vida y seguridad a su familia.
texts.en:
Alba is a young woman who, together with her partner, sells vegetables and basic grains in Managua’s main markets.  This is how she provides for food, basic living costs and her two children’s education.  Her children are still young and go to elementary school.  Her greatest dream is to see each of them with a professional career.  

Alba is requesting her first loan from AFODENIC to build a perimeter wall behind her house.  To do this, she will need to buy blocks, cement, sand, iron, and wire.  She will also need to pay for the labor.  Her only objective is to provide better living conditions and safety for her family.

loans.use: To buy blocks, cement, sand, iron and wire, and to pay labor costs

loans.name: Feliciana Del Socorrro

texts.es: Doña Feliciana, dedicada hace más de 20 años a la venta de ropa de dama, niño y varones, para poder sufragar todos sus gastos básicos del hogar hace fritanga en las noches, comida típica  Nicaragüense, este ha sido su principal medio para sacar adelante a sus hijos quienes ahora son independientes. Feliciana solicita su quinto crédito para reforzar su negocio de comedor comprando alimentos como verduras, granos básicos, frutas para los refrescos, aceite, carnes, pollo y comprara un exhibidor para tener a la vista del cliente el menú del día.
texts.en: Doña Feliciana, makes a living selling women’s, men’s and children's clothing for over 20 years, in order to make ends meet she also makes “fritanga” on the evenings, Nicaraguan typical food, this has been the main source of income to support her children who are now independent. This is Feliciana’s fifth loan request and she will use it to strengthen her diner business purchasing supplies such as vegetables, grains, fruits to make refreshments, cooking oil, meats, chicken and a display so she can showcase the menu to her clientele.

loans.use: to purchase supplies such as vegetables, grains, fruits to make drinks, oil, meats, chicken and a display.

loans.name: Bradis Del Carmen

texts.es: Doña Bradis su negocio es el transporte selectivo de taxi alquilándolo a un cadete, las dificultades que ha tenido son por el alto costo del combustible en la actualidad pero de esa manera Bradis se gana la vida para costear sus gastos básicos del hogar y la de sus hijos quienes todavía están estudiando, todo esto con la ayuda de su esposo. La señora está solicitando crédito para seguir mejorando la infraestructura de su vivienda, esta vez pondrá el cielo raso de su casa, ya que cuando el sol esta fuerte el calor es insoportable, con el préstamo comprara  materiales como plycem, tornillos, aluminio, alambre y el pago de la mano de obra; de esa manera va avanzando las mejoras de su vivienda.
texts.en: Mrs. Bradis' business is taxi transportation. The difficulties she has had are because of the high cost of gasoline currently, but this way Bradis earns her living in order to finance her basic expenses at home and those of her children who are still in school. In all of this, she has the support of her spouse. She is asking for a loan in order to continue improving the infrastructure of her house. This time, she will level the ceiling of her house, since when the sun is shining the heat is unbearable. With the loan, she will purchase materials such as fiberboard, screws, aluminum, wire, and pay for labor. This way, she will be able to continue the improvements on her house.

loans.use: to purchase materials such as fiberboard, screws, aluminum, wire, and to pay for labor.

loans.name: Reynaldo Bismarck
