loans.use: to purchase feed for the chickens and pigs that she has in their corals.

loans.name: Ruben Dario

texts.es:
Ruben aprendió desde muy joven la actividad de la agricultura gracias a que su padre se dedicaba a esta actividad y se la enseñó para trabajar a su lado. Actualmente trabaja de manera independiente y con sus cultivos tiene la oportunidad de generar los ingresos necesarios para el sostenimiento de su esposa y su hijo de 9 años. La gran dificultad que tiene en su cultivo es el cambio climático que a veces hace que pierda sus cosechas; pero ahora buscando sacar adelante su cultivo y preservarlo de estas dificultades, Ruben busca un préstamo para comprar abonos y riegos y proteger así su cultivo contra los fuertes climas.

Su sueño es sacar adelante su negocio y crecer para generar empleo para su familia, además de generar ingresos con los que pueda ofrecer a su esposa y su hijo una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Ruben learned from a young age how to be a farmer, since his father was also a farmer and taught him as they worked side by side. He currently is working independently. His crops allow him to earn an income to support his wife and 9 year old son. The biggest difficulty he has is climate change, which sometimes causes him to lose his crop. He is trying to forge ahead with his crops and protect them from these obstacles. Ruben is seeking a loan to purchase fertilizer and irrigation equipment to protect his crops from severe weather. 

His dream is to make his business of farming successful and grow it to be able to make jobs for his family. In addition, he wants to earn an income to offer a better quality of life to his wife and son.

loans.use: purchase fertilizer and irrigation equipment to protect his crop against climate change

loans.name: Luz Myriam

texts.es:
Luz es una persona que ha tenido que atravesar la gran dificultad de ser madre soltera cabeza de hogar de su hijo de 3 años de edad y para poder sostener su hogar tiene un negocio de venta de ropa con el cual ha podido sacar su hogar adelante. La gran dificultad de capital que tiene no le ha permitido poder ofrecer una mejor variedad de productos a sus clientes y esto ha retrazado que sus ventas mejoren, por esto buscando mejorar esta situación Luz aspira a que un préstamo le permita comprar surtido de ropa para aumentar la variedad de prendas que ofrece a sus clientes y así aumentar sus ventas.

Su sueño es poder sacar adelante este negocio y que le permita brindar a su hijo una buena calidad de vida y todo lo que necesita.
texts.en:
Luz is a person who has had to go through the great difficulty of being a single mother and the family head to her 3 year old son. To be able to maintain her home she has a clothing sales business with which she has been able to get her family ahead. The great difficulty of lack of capital has not allowed her to offer a better variety of products to her customers and this has delayed the improvements of her sales. Looking to improve this situation Luz hopes that a loan will allow her to buy a range of clothing in order to increase the variety of items she offers to her customers and so increase her sales.

Her dream is to be able to get her business ahead and offer her son a good quality of life and everything he needs.

loans.use: to buy a range of clothing in order to increase the variety of items she offers to her customers and so increase her sales.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a gas stove and an electric grinder, so as to increase production capacity and reduce costs.

loans.name: Luis Alfonso

texts.es:
Luis es una persona muy luchadora que con gran esfuerzo ha venido sacando su negocio de venta de frutas y verduras adelante. El surtido de frutas y verduras lo compra en grandes bultos en la zona rural de su municipio, y luego en el municipio los distribuye en pequeñas cantidades por las casas, restaurantes y tiendas. La gran dificultad que Luis presenta es que su medio de transporte es una bicicleta, pero últimamente ha tenido bastante distribución de su producto, teniendo que recurrir a pagar un transporte en moto para poder entregar los pedidos de sus clientes, y esto ha hecho que sus costos se eleven considerablemente. Para mejorar esta situación, Luis busca un préstamo para comprar una moto con la que pueda hacer la distribución de sus frutas y verduras en todo su municipio.

Su sueño es llegar a tener un gran negocio con un local bien dotado en su municipio y poder ofrecer mejores ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
Luis is a real fighter who made a great effort to get his fruit and vegetables selling business ahead. He buys his range of fruit and vegetables in bulk in a rural area of his municipality and then he distributes them in small quantities from house to house, in restaurants and shops. The great difficulty that Luis faces is that his mode of transportation is a bicycle, but lately he has had an increase in the distribution of his products and has had to pay a motorcycle taxi service to deliver his customers' orders. This has increased his costs considerably. To improve this situation Luis is looking for a loan in order to buy a motorbike with which he can distribute his fruit and vegetables all around the municipality.

His dream is to have a large business with a well stocked store in his municipality and to be able to offer a become income to his family.

loans.use: to buy a motorbike with which he can distribute his fruit and vegetables all around the municipality.

loans.name: Jose Efrain

texts.es:
Jose actualmente se dedica a la actividad de la agricultura donde tiene cuidado de cerdos y producción de leche con unas vacas lecheras que tiene en el terreno que es de su esposa. Esta actividad la aprendió desde que estaba muy joven, pues desde los 15 años su padre murió y a Jose le tocó hacerse cargo del cuidado de sus 7 hermanos, por esto ahora tiene una gran experiencia que le permita identificarse por tener productos de muy buena calidad. Gracias a que sus ventas han venido aumentando, su capacidad de producción de leche se está viendo insuficiente para responder a todos sus clientes, es por esto que busca un préstamo para comprar dos vacas lecheras para aumentar su capacidad de producción de leche. 

Su sueño es tener un buen negocio con el cual pueda sacar adelante a su esposa y sus 4 hijos, brindándoles una buena educación y una buena calidad de vida en el hogar.
texts.en:
Jose presently makes a living in farming. He looks after pigs and milk production with some milking cows which he has in a plot of land which belongs to his wife. He learnt this activity when he was very young; when he was 15 years old his father died and Jose had to look after his seven siblings. This is why he has a lot of experience and is known for having high quality products. Thanks to the increase in his sales, his milk production is now insufficient to respond to his customer demand and so he is looking for a loan to buy two milking cows in order to increase his milk production capacity.

His dream is to have a good business with which he can get his wife and their four children ahead, providing them with a good education and a good quality of life at home.

loans.use: to buy two milking cows in order to increase his milk production capacity.

loans.name: Fabio Luis

texts.es:
Fabio trabaja desde hace aproximadamente 10 años en la actividad de la carpintería, y con esta ha venido generando los ingresos que requiere en su hogar para sostener los gastos de su esposa y su hijo de 17 años de edad. El taller lo inició en el segundo piso de su casa y gracias al esfuerzo diario que hace con extensas jornadas de trabajo, ha podido ir superando las dificultades de capital que tiene en el negocio. Actualmente ha podido ir teniendo buenas ventas, y para poder responder a la demanda de sus clientes necesita de una máquina con la que no cuenta en su taller; como no cuenta con un capital suficiente, Fabio busca un préstamo para comprar una máquina sinfín con la que pueda aumentar su capacidad de producción y responder a los pedidos de sus clientes.

Su sueño es sacar adelante este negocio brindándoles a sus clientes una buena calidad en los productos. Además, aspira a generar mayores ingresos para que su familia pueda gozar de una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Fabio has been working as a carpenter for about ten years.  With this job, he generates the household income he needs to support his wife and 17 year old son.  His workshop is located on the second floor of his house, and thanks to his daily efforts and long working hours, he has been able to overcome the difficulties he had raising capital for his business.  Currently, his sales have been good, and in order to respond to customer demand, he needs a machine that he does not have in his workshop.  As he doesn’t have enough capital, Fabio is looking for a loan to purchase a Sin Fin machine, which will increase his production capacity and enable him to fill customer orders.  His dream is to succeed with his business by providing his customers with good quality products.  In addition, he aspires to generate more income so that his family can enjoy a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase a Sin Fin machine.

loans.name: Marlon Antonio

texts.es: Marlon de 29 años de edad es casado, hace más de 5 años trabaja como vendedor ambulante de CD,s gorras, controles de tv y equipos de sonido y algunos encargos de sus clientes, es un trabajo muy pesado debido a que tiene que andar bajo el sol y la lluvia para poder vender para el sustento diario. Solicita su tercer crédito para mejorar la vivienda donde habita con su esposa e hija en casa de su suegra, en la cual desea acondicionar por lo menos un cuarto para brindarle mejores condiciones de vida a su hija y esposa, ya que no cuentan con los suficientes recursos para poder obtener su propia casa. Con el préstamo comprara materiales de construcción como cemento, arena, bloques y hierro, Marlon tiene muchos deseos de superación y en sus créditos anteriores ha demostrado una excelente conducta de pago.
texts.en:
Marlon is 29 years old and is married. He has worked for more than five years sellings CDs, hats, TV remotes, sound systems and other client orders by traveling to make his sales. It is a tough job because he has to walk under the son and rain to make sales for his daily sustenance. 

He is requesting his third loan to improve his home where he lives with his wife and daughter in his mother-in-law's house. He hopes to build at least one room in his home to give his wife and daughter better living conditions. They do not have enough resources to buy their own house. With the loan he will buy construction materials including cement, sand, blocks and iron. Marlon has many wishes to improve his life and has demonstrated an excellent payment record in his previous loans.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, blocks and iron.

loans.name: Hugo Guillermo

texts.es: Hugo tiene 27 años de edad estado civil soltero, no tiene hijos.Hugo comenzó ya hace 4 años el vende productos naturales. Hugo cuenta que resulto muy duro porque le  daba mucha vergüenza por solo comenzó vendiendo a sus familiares pero ya ahora no porque le vende a sus amigos, vecinos y pues después fue tomando experiencia ya que comenzó  a trabajar en una empresa de productos naturales. Con el préstamo Hugo quiere comprar: forever servic , forever freedom que son productos naturales etc.
texts.en: Hugo is 27 years old, single, and does not have any children. He says that he started selling natural products four years ago. He tells us that it was hard at first because he felt very timid and therefore started by selling only to his relatives, but now it is not so and he also sells to his friends and neighbors. Since then, he has been gaining experience and started to work for a natural products business. With this loan, Hugo wants to buy "Forever Servic" and "Forever Freedom," which are natural products.

loans.use: to buy "Forever Servic" and "Forever Freedom," which are natural products

loans.name: Edwin Christian

texts.es: Edwin tiene 18 años de edad estado civil soltero, no tiene hijos.Edwin  comenzó vendiendo productos naturales como ayudante, ahora el monta su microempresa de  ventas de productos naturales. Edwin dice que resulto muy duro porque le  daba mucha vergüenza por solo comenzó vendiendo a sus familiares pero ya ahora no porque le vende a sus amigos, vecinos .Con el préstamo el va a comprar productos como: kis, aloe vera, aerium
texts.en: Edwin is 18 years old, single, and does not have any children.  He says that he started out selling natural products as an assistant and then set up his own micro-business selling natural products.  He says that it was very difficult because he was really embarrassed.  He started out selling to family members but now he also sells to friends and neighbors.  He will use his loan to buy product such as kis, aloe vera and aerium.

loans.use: to buy products such as kis, aloe vera and aerium

loans.name: Maria Rosana

texts.es: Doña María tiene la edad de 46 años es viuda, tuvo seis hijos de los cuales 4 son independientes 2 están a su cargo estudiando por los que ella trabaja vendiendo variedad de ropa, comida y nacatamales, negocio con el que saco adelante a sus hijos sola sin la ayuda de nadie ahora ellos revierten ese sacrificio con gratitud ayudándola económica y físicamente. María Rosana está solicitando su primer crédito para construir un muro perimetral en la parte oeste de su vivienda por lo que necesitara comprar bloques, cemento, arena, hierro y el pago de la mano de obra y así seguir progresando con la ayuda de sus hijos para el beneficio de ellos.
texts.en: Maria is a 46 year old widow with six children. Four of them are independent, and she sells a variety of clothing, food, and “nacatamales” (a type of tamale made with maize, dough, rice, potatoes, meat and vegetables), to support her two younger children who are in school and under her care.  Through this business, she got her family ahead, alone, without anyone’s help.  Now, they are repaying her for her sacrifice and showing their gratitude by helping her financially and physically.  Maria Rosana is requesting her first loan to build a perimeter wall on the west side of her home.  She will need to buy blocks, cement, sand, and iron as well as pay for labor.  In this way, she will continue making progress with the help of her children and for their benefit.

loans.use: to purchase blocks, cement, sand, and iron as well as pay for labor.

loans.name: Eddy Santiago

texts.es: Eddy tiene 25 años de edad estado civil soltero , no tiene hijos .Comenzó con poca mercadería de víveres el vendía cola, arroz,  para luego formar una  tienda de víveres en su casa pues eso es lo que ahora es su sustento de vida para El y su familia. Desde las 7:00am abre su negocio. El anhela que su negocio crezca más y poderlo surtir con mas productos. Pues con el préstamo el comprara mas víveres como .arroz, azúcar, aceite y mejorar su vivienda y su tienda etc.
texts.en:
Eddy is 25 years old. He is not married and has no children. Eddy started his business, selling very few basic supplies like soda and rice. Eventually, he set up a grocery store attached to his house that supports him. He opens his store every day at 7 a.m. 

Eddy wishes to expand his business and be able to stock it with more products. With this loan, he will buy more basic supplies such as rice, sugar, and oil in order to improve his store and his house.

loans.use: to buy more basic supplies like rice, sugar, oil, and to improve his home and his store.

loans.name: Coumba's Group

texts.fr:
Ce groupe a été créé le 13 décembre 2008. C'est un groupe dont la plupart des membres habite ensemble et ont pour activité principale le commerce.
Coumba, âgée de 51 ans, debout à droite de la photo, est mariée et mère de 05 enfants dont 02 garçons et 03 femmes. Avec son prêt, elle exerce le commerce de pagnes. Elle achète des pagnes qu'elle va revendre dans les grandes villes où les produits s'écoulent facilement et avec de gros bénéfices. Elle exerce cette activité depuis des années. Hormis cela, elle fait de l'embouche ovine et caprine comme activité parallèle.
Avec les bénéfices générés, elle compte payer la scolarité de ses enfants, et épauler son mari dans les charges familiales et surtout augmenter son épargne pour faire accroître son prêt.
texts.en: This group was set up on 13th December 2008 and the majority of its members live together, with trading as their main activity. Coumba, who is 51 years old and standing on the right of the photo, is married and mother to five children: two boys and three girls. With her loan she can carry out her business of selling "pagnes" (pieces of colourful fabric). She buys the "pagnes" that she resells in large towns where products flow easily and with large profits. She has been carrying out this business for years. Aside from this, she fattens sheep and goats as a concurrent business. With the profits she generates, she plans to pay for her children's schooling and help her husband with the household expenses, but above all increase her savings so that she can increase her loan.

loans.use: to buy "pagnes".

loans.name: Amy

texts.fr:
Amy est une femme âgée de 43 ans, elle est mariée et mère de 2 garçons et 4 filles. 

Avec son prêt elle achète 2 bassines de mil et un sac d'arachide qu'elle revend dans les marchés hebdomadaires. 

Avec les bénéfices générés elle paie ses intérêts, renforce son épargne et améliore les conditions de vie de sa progéniture.
texts.en:
Amy is 43 years old, married, and the mother of two boys and four girls. 

With her loan she will buy two tubs of millet and a sack of peanuts that she will sell at the weekly markets.

With the profits made she will pay the interest on her loan, build up her savings, and improve the living conditions of her children.

loans.use: to buy millet and peanuts to sell at the weekly markets.

loans.name: Mama's Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe karantaba  est créé le 25 Août 2011 au jour d’inauguration du banc villageois. Il est composé de 27 femmes qui toutes issues du même village, elles sont très solidaires entre elles et s’entre aident dans leurs activités. Elles ont comme activité principale le petit commerce.

Madame Mame (assise à l’extrême droite) est l’emprunteuse vedette du groupe. Elle est âgée de 44 ans, elle est mariée et  mère de 05 enfants (04 filles et 01 garçon). Elle est vendeuse d’huile de palm qu’elle achète en bidon de 20 litres au marché central de la ville pour la revente dans son quartier en bouteille d’un litre et d’un quart de litre.

 Son nouveau prêt lui permettra  d’acheter 03 bidons de 20 litres à 16 000 FCFA qu’elle revendra respectivement à 1 000 FCFA le litre et 250 FCFA le quart de litre.

Avec les bénéfices elle compte augmenter son épargne d’une part et d’autre part aider son mari dans les charges familiales.
texts.en:
Le Karantaba group was created on August 25, 2011, the day of the inception of the banc villageios.  It is composed of 27 women who all come from the same village.  They have strong bonds among them and help each other in their businesses.  They are mainly involved in sales. 
Mrs. Mame (seated to the extreme right) is the leading entrepreneur of the group.  She is 44 years old, married, and the mother of five children (four girls and one boy).  She buys palm oil in 20-liter barrels at the city's central market, and then sells it in her district in one-liter and quarter-liter bottles.  
Her new loan will allow her to buy three 20-liter barrels of oil at 16,000 FCFA which she will sell at 1,000 per liter and 250 per quarter-liter. 
With the profits that she makes she plans to increase her savings as well as help her husband with family expenses.

loans.use: to buy three 20-litre barrels at 16,000 FCFA which she will sell at 1,000 FCFA per liter and 250 FCFA per quarter-litre.

loans.name: Pauline's Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe est issus de la scission de Santhiaba en 02 groupe. Créé le 23 Mars 2001, entre des femmes du même quartier et leurs amies des autres quartiers, le groupe a vite grandi pour être finalement scindé en 02. La majorité de ses membres évolue dans le petit commerce de légumes, fruits etc. 
Mme Élisabeth est une veuve, âgée de 65 ans, avec 05 enfants dont 02 garçons et 03 fille âgés entre 21 et 13 ans. Elle se situe à droite de la photo, debout et levant la main. Elle s'active dans la vente de balais et de fruits saisonniers. Avec ce prêt, elle compte acheter 03 colis de balais à 125.000 frs l'unité, 01 chargement de pastèques pour une valeur de 70.000 et 15.000 frs de fonds de roulement.
Les bénéfices escomptés seront affectés à la prise en charge de ses enfants pour la nourriture, la scolarité et la santé, mais aussi à augmenter son épargne dans le programme.
texts.en:
This group was formed when Santhiaba was divided in two.  Created on March 23, 2001, of women from the same district and their friends from other districts, the group quickly grew large enough to be divided into two groups.  The majority of its members are involved in the business of selling vegetables, fruits etc. 
Mrs. Elisabeth is a widow, 65 years old, and has five children, two boys and three girls between the ages of 21 and 13.  She is to the right in the photo, standing with her hand raised.  She is in the business of selling brooms and seasonal fruits.  With this loan she plans to buy three bundles of brooms at 123,000 frs per unit, one load of watermelons at 70,000, and use 15,000 frs for working capital.
The profits made will be used to meet food, education, and healthcare needs of her children, and also to increase her saving in the program.

loans.use: to buy bundles of brooms and baskets of fruits to sell.
